Staff

  • James Gerladon

    Editor of fruits

    James is a big fan of fruit, and deals with the editing of these blogs.

  • Marco Mannco

    The director of this company

    Marco is the biggest fan of fruit, no one else can match his love for fruit. He also runs this company as the current director, and is so far taking it in the right direction.

  • Pepe Silvia

    Mail guy for fruit

    Pepe is just the mail guy, he deals with all of the fan mail is in charge of paying the bills. His favorite fruit is the pear.

  • Potato Gardner

    Web Developer

    Potato is the cream of the crop when it comes to web development. He’s reliable but has a major hatred of all things fruit related making him a valuable asset for a differing view on fruits.

  • Richard Avery

    H.R

    Being in H.R doesn’t mean he’s a stuck up guy, he loves movies, fruits and long walks on the beach. His favorite fruit is anything tropical except pinapples.
